sys_script_include.description:
This Script Include handles the (public) Historic ACL Analysis. A "Historic ACL" is a ACL-like record that contains all relevant data (table, condition, script and roles) for testing a given record against the configuration. If a given record is "exposed" via the Historic ACL, it was leaked when the table was queried via the 'Simple List'-Widget.
This Script Include is exclusively accessed via the Scripted REST API '/api/x_376096_dla/public' (GlideScriptedHierarchicalWorker).
sys_script_include.name: DLAHistoricACLAnalyser
